title: variable vt100 erroneous CNRM-CM6-1 and CNRM-ESM2-1 outputs
description: The definition of field vt100 as requested in CMIP6 Data Request version 01.00.21 (used for all runs) is "Northward Heat Flux due to Eddies" ; it was overlooked, which resulted in the publication of a field which is a raw temperature advection (i.e. a raw product of temperature and northward wind component); furthermore, the units indicated is W/m*2, which is erroneous
